betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The process of emptying your Alchemical Furnace is starting to drive you crazy. Essentia is volatile and easily turns into Flux, but surely you can do better.

Turns out you actually can't. At least not yet. So instead you've created a magical automaton to do the manual labor for you.

Right click the golem against an Alchemical Furnace (or other source you want your golem to take Essentia from) to set that as it's home/input location. Right click the golem with an animation core to animate it. Right click a golem with a Golemancer's Bell to start designating valid dropoff points, then right-click such locations with the bell to mark them.

Not every jar you want filled needs to be individually marked, golems are smart enough to recognize collections of adjacent jars if one of them is marked. Though keep the golem's maximum working range in mind.

Golem pathfinding can charitably be described as "there", so make sure their route from A to B is as straightforward as possible. For the same reason golems with higher carry capacity - which does determine Essentia carry capacity for Alchemy golems - are generally preferred over faster golems, given that fewer trips means less pathfinding.
